title: In television's The Odd Couple, who played Felix? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1970–75 Felix Unger was played by Tony Randal in a television adaptation of the 1965 play The Odd Couple by Neil Simon. In a career spanning about six decades, Randall received six Golden Globe Award nominations and six Primetime Emmy Award nominations (winning one)  The 2015–17 tv show Felix was played by Thomas Lennon, an American actor, comedian, screenwriter, producer, director and novelist. As an actor he is best known for his work as a cast member on MTV's The State, and for his role as Lieutenant Jim Dangle on the Comedy Central series Reno 911.

There have been several television adaptations of the play In The Odd Couple (TV Series 1970–1975) - IMDb, it was Tony Randall, whose portrayal is now seen as the archetype for the character In The New Odd Couple (TV Series 1982–1983) - IMDb - it was Ron Glass In The Odd Couple (TV Series 2015–2017) - IMDb it was Thomas Lennon
